did.abstract: Collection consists of letters received by Button from Myron Adams, Jr. Although the two had not met, they were introduced by a mutual friend. Adams' letters contain scattered references to his work in the U.S. Signal Corps, as well as his reflections and discussions on religion, education, and his tentative plans to study law following his release from the Army.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of letters received by Button from Myron Adams, Jr. Although the two had not met, they were introduced by a mutual friend. Adams' letters contain scattered references to his work in the U.S. Signal Corps, as well as his reflections and discussions on religion, education, and his tentative plans to study law following his release from the Army.
